talk_text:
Hahahahaha!!
You dare to summon the great Laharl!? 
You sure are brave, human!

I am the most powerful and vicious Overlord in the Netherworld!
I'm Laharl, 
the greatest and scariest Overlord that has ever existed!

....what?
You're saying you want to train the greatest Overlord in existence?

A mere human being trying to train an Overlord? 
Don't be silly!

Uh huh...... Forget it.
I am here to show you just how terrifying 
a Demon can be!

You better be mentally prepared for this!!
Hahahahahaha!

#NAME#.
How doese it feel to become 
the vassal of the Biggest Badass Overlord?

What does that look on your face mean?
So you forgot that 
you became my vassal?

You don't have a choice.
You were always been destined to 
become my vassel. Don't fight your fate.

There is one more thing you need to remember. 
Everything that is mine only belongs to me. 
#NAME#'s things also belong to me.

From this day forward, 
any rare items you acquire 
must be given to me, Laharl!

Have I made myself clear?
Hahahahahaha!

Hmm... 
What can be done?

Hmm? Oh, #NAME#.
You came at just the right time.
Tell me what you think.

It's like this.
Etna refuses to call 
me "Your Majesty".

My father.... 
After he died, 
I became the new Overlord.

But even then, Etna never called me an 
Overlord or "Your Majesty". She 
kept on calling me just "Your Royal Highness".

This is why the 
Prinnies and the other vassals 
still only call me "Your Royal Highness".

It's so freaking annoying!
How can I be an Overlord if even they don't give me the respect I deserve!
Do you understand what I need to go through?

Etna 
still speaks about my dad as if he is a god.
But that is one issue. This is another.

To show everyone that I am an Overlord, I 
must reveal my true power.

In other words, I think it is time to 
eat the sweets 
Etna loves that she left in the fridge.

#NAME#.
Are you certain you want to help me 
become the greatest Overlord of all time?

Why do 
you care so much about a request coming out of nowhere?

Sometimes, I really don't understand what 
goes on in the minds of Humans....

Even my own mother was a Human and I didn't get her either.
She sacrificed herself 
in order to save me....

Listen up, #NAME#!
Now remember, you can only die after getting my permission!

It doesn't matter what situation you find yourself in. 
You need my permission to die!
That's an order!

Everything belongs to me and only me!
#NAME#'s things also belong to me!

Your life 
now belongs to me!

Therefore, from this day forward, 
you will not be allowed to die without my permission. 
You can't go anywhere without asking me first either! Understand!?

Humph.....
So, I've finally arrived.

All of this is due to your efforts. 
Thanks, #NAME#.

You no longer need to train the most powerful Overlord. 
From now on, you're the Overlord.

Hahahah, I'm just joking! That would never happen!
I am the most powerful Overlord ever existed!
Hahahahahaha!

.....But, I guess 
you've 
helped a little bit, like 1%.

I'll give you that, but don't get used to it, 
#NAME#.

To become the strongest Overlord....
You'll need to reach Lv. 9999. 
There is still a long way to go!

You'll need to keep helping me, 
#NAME#.

Hey!?
Wait a minute!
Why have you summoned me!?

I'm trying to enjoy 
a snack that I won fair and square! You've ruined the moment!

I'm usually so stressed out. 
I only feel relaxed during 
snack time.....
Give my sweets back to me.

But compensation isn't enough.
Until I get my sweets to heal my body and mind, 
you will not be forgiven. Understand?

Ha! What luck! 
I can have as many sweets as I want now.

#NAME#.
I want something sweet.

I want to have Jutunheim's 
special Omega Milk
.

Hmm?
Why are you looking at me like that?
Are you trying to tell me I eat too much?

Oh.
Are you worried that I'll get fat?

Humph!
Stop being a worrywart!

This slim and sexy 
body of mine can
absorb all the sweets! Bring it on!

Also, you know that girls 
always crave sweets that can 
feed their body and soul.

What? Diabetes?
Don't make me laugh!!
That only leads to a dead end!

Even if I am the queen of sweets, 
there is still one that I hate.
Red bean buns....

Listen, 
this really isn't a lead-in to a rakugo performance where I tell you comically all about how "I hate red bean buns"
.

There used to be this individual I really admired.
My admiration had nothing to do with romantic love. 
I just really respected this person.

He was the father of Prince, Laharl. 
His name was King Krichevskoy.

In my hour of need, 
he was the one who came to save me.

If it wasn't for him, 
I would be dead right now.

It was 
Dark Bun who killed my beloved King Krichevskoy.

....Well, 
that is not the truth, but...

So, now, whenever I see a red bean bun, 
it reminds me 
of King Krichevskoy.

As a result, 
the buns always taste salty instead of sweet.

Do you believe me? How could I 
say this in front of 
#NAME#!

Ah! What the heck!
His Royal Highness will 
never grows up!

You listen to me, 
#NAME#.

After Your Royal Highness failed to win in this fighting game, he destroyed 
half the Overlord's castle 
out of rage.

Do you know how many times this has happened?
Every time he did this, I had to call the Prinnies to come help make repairs. 
He has never considered how difficult this task is for me!

His Royal Highness is nothing more than a 
primary school student in a grown man's body!

Really... 
If this continues, how am I ever going to 
fulfill King Krichevskoy's request?

Before King Krichevskoy died, 
he entrusted His Royal Highness 
to me.

His only wish was for His Royal Highness 
to grow up to become a qualified Overlord like him.....

I want to help His Royal Highness become a powerful Overlord so that 
I can achieve my own dream 
of becoming King Krichevskoy's most trustworthy vassal.

His Royal Highness is still a long way away from being a 
true Overlord. I still can't call him "Your Majesty".

.....Huh?
You're asking me what I will do if His Royal Highness is never worthy enough to be 
King Krichevskoy's heir?

Hmmm.
Do you even need to ask?

Kill him!
And after he is dead, 
I will become the Overlord!

Whoops.
It's definitely a possibility, #NAME#.

Even if I do so say myself, 
Lv. 1000 is an incredible achievement!

I can see potential in you. 
You'll be able to train whoever wants to become the greatest Overlord.

To be honest, when I first saw you, 
I thought you'd give me a headache....
Don't take it personally.

I just 
didn't want to have to 
waste my time babysitting a human.

But hey, 
you proved me wrong, #NAME#. I saw you 
complete the mission with no distractions.

Maybe you are a little bit 
like King Krichevskoy? Just 
a little bit.

I can't explain it. 
There's this quality that transcends race and gender.
Hmm...

Maybe it is the sublimity of one's soul?
Hahaha.
What am I talking about?

I don't usually talk like this, right?
This is not who I usually am.

I guess you are really good at 
messing me up. You should be proud of yourself.

So, keep it up. 
Please take care of me in the future, 
#NAME#.

Hello!
I'm a Prinny, dood!

Don't let my cute penguin appearance deceive you, dood. 
I'm actually an envoy of the Netherworld. 
Don't come too close to me if you know what's good for you, dood.

You need to be 
psychologically prepared if you're wanting to hire me, dood.
And my rates are not cheap, dood.

I can work all year round without taking a rest!
22 hours a day!
Here are my conditions....

You need to give me 5 Sardines! 
What do you think, dood!!!?

....Sorry, dood.
That was too greedy of me, dood.
1 Sardine will be enough, dood.
Please remember this from now on, dood.

Did you know, dood?
Inside every Prinny 
is a sinful human soul, dood.

That's right. We were the 
same as you, #NAME#! 
We were Humans, dood!

But, I'm not too sure how it works. 
After a Human dies, he becomes a Prinny and is sent to the Netherworld. 
Demons (mostly Etna) often then summon them to complete tasks, dood.

We've been given this fate because 
we committed sins in the Human World, dood.

Any Human who commits a sin 
will turn into a Prinny after death and be 
sent to Celestia or the Netherworld to atone for their sins, dood.

Day after day, 
all we do is work.....

After we have paid our debts, we can reincarnate and be reborn with 
the help of the Red Moon, dood.

Huh?
You want to know what sin I committed, dood?
....That's a secret, dood.

...To be more specific, 
I'll tell you once I have reached Lv. 500, dood.

Sigh...
A Prinny's life is not easy, dood....

Just today I gotta clean the bathroom, wash clothes, and cook. 
Lady Etna wants me to buy her sweets and 
Miss Flonne has asked for me to help record a cartoon.

I also have to play a game with His Royal Highness, Laharl.
I don't even have time to catch my own breath, dood.

Sardines are the 
only pleasure I have in life, dood.

Fortunately, Lord Valavatorez recently taught 
me a bunch of 
new recipes that contain Sardines.

With this new knowledge, both my soul and stomach 
are well nourished, dood....

Ah....
But, as I was saying, I only feel truly happy when I'm cooking Sardines....

Looking back.... I really wish I never made that mistake 
when I was a human
....

I guess it's that time, dood.
I only 
tell #NAME#?he truth, dood.

Actually.... 
when I was a Human, I was a thief, dood.

No, that wasn't right, dood.
Theft is my crime, dood.

According to the law, I am 
guilty if I ever was sentenced to prison or 
fined, dood.

You may ask why I did it.... 
I did it for revenge, dood.

When I was in middle school, 
there was this bully who used to 
steal from me, dood.

He took all of my pocket money and ran away. 
I had to steal 
from my parents, dood.

His family had a shop. 
I didn't know if his parents had died or just run away. 
He lived with his grandparents.

I wanted revenge, 
so I stole from their shop, dood.

At first, I was worried that if he found out about what I did, 
he would make my life miserable, dood.
But I got away with it squeaky clean, dood.

I tried to 
steal enough stuff so that the total worth was equal to what 
he had stolen from me.
But...

A year after that...
His family's shop had to shut, dood.

He had to leave school, dood.
With him gone, the school that was once hell for me had 
become a paradise, dood.

I didn't know 
if the shop closed down 
because of me, dood...

But... 
that kind old grandfather, 
and his smiling wife....

I kept thinking about their faces... 
and I've never forgotten them, dood.
I was so stupid, dood!

#NAME#!
Thank you, dood!

Being a small Prinny, 
I can't belive I have reached Lv. 1000, dood!

Although I've sinned, 
you never abandoned me and have continued to train me. 
I am eternally grateful, dood.

In the future, I will not see my work as a 
Prinny as a burden. 
I will carry it out diligently, dood!
Until I am reincarnated....!

.....Oh right.
I forgot to tell you. I bumped into that bully recently, dood.

Did you forget it?
What I told you 
about the bully who stole money from me, dood.

Unsurprisingly, 
he also became a Prinny, dood.

But he's really different now. 
He even apologized to me for what he did in middle school, dood.

Out of concern, 
I asked him how his 
grandparents were doing, dood.

He explained to me that his store never closed down. 
It had just been sold to someone else, dood.
It was sold at a good price too.

Even better, his grandparents were able to retire with a great pension and 
live happily, dood.
.....But, did he tell me the truth, dood?

Somehow I got a feeling that 
he knew about everything that happened.... 
Maybe he lied to me, dood.

But, even if it is true, 
I will continue to work hard to redeem myself. 
I will be a good Prinny, dood.

You're the one who gives me courage, 
#NAME#. No one else, dood.

Thanks for all that you do for me. 
#NAME#.

#NAME#.
You will be the one who successfully trains the strongest Overlord who has ever lived.
I've heard about you.

You can call me Adell.
I am a Devil Buster from a town called Holt.

When it comes to combat, there is no one better than me.
I am very confident in my capabilities.

We were always destined to meet one another. 
Trust me, 
my fists will be very useful to you in completing your mission.

Ugh, if 
Rozalin were here, she'd be complaining that I'm 
overly obsessed with fighting all the time.

Ah, this Rozalin. 
She is my... 
my...well...

Anyway, 
it's a pleasure to meet you!

Hey, #NAME#.
Do you have a special someone?

Ah, 
I guess I asked that a little abruptly.
Sorry....

My, uh 
She's my 
love,love,love, lover....I guess?

I'll never understand what goes on 
in Rozalin's head....

I hope she is happy.
I hope she is doing ok.
I hope everything works out for her.

I don't understand why 
every time I see her 
I somehow manage to get into an argument with her....

I think 
she actually liked me... 
but she is always so grumpy.

Ah, women, right?
Can't live with them, can't live without 'em!

You just gave me an idea, 
#NAME#.

I want to make Rozalin happy. I've played a ton of 
love simulation games 
to improve my understanding of women.

I don't usually play video games, 
but I really want to impress her. 
I stayed up all night playing!

I now understand! 
The most important thing to remember is "options"!

To make an analogy... 
1. You're still so beautiful. 
2. What good weather we have today!

In the past, I was always option #2.
I never realized there was an alternative, 
an option #1.

But, those love simulation games helped me understand. 
There was another option! 
And it was extremely powerful.

After this, 
I went to find Rozalin to try out a little experiment. 
I tried to choose option #1. And as a result...

She blushed 
and yelled "You're stupid! Stupid!"
She then proceeded to slap me.

I really don't understand women!!
It's such a mystery!!

Ah.....
#NAME#, I'm always complaining to you 
about Rozalin.

But to me, Rozalin 
is the most important person in the whole universe. 
The human heart really is weird.

I really 
can't imagine what life would be like 
without Rozalin.

In the past, I was afraid of women. 
Now, women fascinate me.
I never even imagined....

Do you know 
what I am most afraid of now, #NAME#?

It's 
losing Rozalin.

The happier I become now, 
the more I am afraid of losing her in the future.

In this world, 
everything dies.
Nothing can escape that fate.

But, as long as I remain by her side, 
I will be there to protect her from harm.

So, I hope 
I can become stronger.

Hey, #NAME#.
I hope you can help me achieve that dream.

Don't show me any mercy.
This is all I ask of you.

Oh? Oh.....!
I can feel power surging through my body!
I've never felt like this before....

This feeling is completely different to what I used to feel when I 
fought with powerful enemies.

It... 
feels good, #NAME#.
I guess I have obtained this power because you've become my friend.

I see.
So many 
doors have just opened for me.

Thanks, #NAME#!
If I hadn't met you, 
I would never have been able to become this strong.

But, our journey 
does not end here.

We must remember to go all out wherever we go! 
That's just my style!!

Come on! You have to help me achieve my goal! 
#NAME#!

I aim to reach...
Lv.9999!!!!!!

Humph.....
You've summoned me. 
This must be important.

My name is Rozalin.
The sinful rose of the Netherworld.

....what?
You're saying you want to train the greatest Overlord in existence?
Idiot!

If I became the strongest Overlord....
I'd just feel empty inside, 
witnessing people getting killed day after day.

....Don't waste your time training those boring fools.
You should spend your time 
dealing with more important matters.

Hmph...
You want to know more?
That is...
Love!!

Well.....
Adell......

Oh, #NAME#.
Come and chat with me. 
You know Adell.... Ah..

Adell is my... Uh... 
How do I explain it? Adell is just 
someone who has always been there for me.

But, he 
doesn't understand women at all.

I'm very wayward. 
I can be a real handful.

He has never understood this is 
how a girl's heart works. I've always acted so coquettish 
towards the man that I love.

Really. He really makes me worry. 
#NAME#, what 
do you think?

Hmph.... Hmph.... Hmph....
Adell....

Oh, #NAME#.
Listen to me. 
There is something definitely wrong with Adell.

He once said to me 
"You're still so beautiful"
.

Duh! Of course I am beautiful! 
But Adell has never said 
anything like that to me before.

I was so shocked 
that I slapped him.

He tried to save himself by making the excuse that 
he simply said that because of some game he was playing....

Is he playing some dating simulation game 
to learn about love....?

If that's the truth...ugh! 
Does he actually think he can compare me 
to the fake women he sees in a game!?

I guess I just have to confront him.
You should come help, #NAME#.

Oh, #NAME#.
Sorry. I was thinking about something.

...I've known you for quite some time.
I guess I can tell you this.

I am the Overlord Zenon's only daughter. 
I've spent most of my life 
sequestered in a massive mansion where I was able to get whatever I wanted.

I always believed that my 
father loved me very much...

I always believed that 
my relationship with my dad was a good one....
But...

But Overlord Zenon isn't actually my father. 
No, I was wrong....

He tried to use me. 
He kept me in that mansion 
like it was a cage.

But...
When I turned 5, Zenon gave me 
an old teddy bear....

He gave me a 
birthday cake for my 6th birthday....

He made white roses fall down on the garden outside the mansion 
like snowflakes when I turned 7....

Even now, 
I still can't believe any of this were hypocritical....

.....Sorry.
This has nothing to do with you.
Please forget everything I've told you.

Ah.
I'll reach Lv. 1000 in no time.
Thanks for the hard work, #NAME#.

Time flies quickly when I am with you. 
I don't know why.

I never knew that anyone 
besides Adell could make me feel like this.

You've gained my trust.
Don't take this lightly!
This is maybe your greatest achievement.

When I'm with you, 
I feel like I'm a little girl again.

I want to give you a little gift.... 
What can I give you that will do the trick?

Oh, yes!
When Adell and I finally get married, 
I'll let you witness it.

Hmph...
How about it?
Is there any gift better than that?

I am Mao, the Dean of the Evil Academy and 
the Freshman Leader.
I have been recognized as the fiercest and brightest student who has ever attended the academy.

You are #NAME#, right?
Are you also a top student? Are you a delinquent?

Do you wash your hands after using the toilet?
Do you like to steal other students' lunches?
Or never return any games you borrow from your friends?
Every top student usually does these things.

You should never go to bed or get up early, 
have a perfect attendance record, or be nice to others.

#NAME#.
You'll definitely make a good top student.

#NAME#.
When you have the time, would you mind accompanying me?

It's not a biggie. It'll take no time at all.
It's just a little experiment.

I just want to transform your asshole so that 
you can fly freely in the sky.

How does that sound? Why are you so nervous?
Don't worry!
It'll just hurt a little.

If you do this experiment, 
I'll reward you with a year's supply of sweet potatoes!
Doesn't that sound nice?

It's not easy 
to run a school.

Last night, I broke into the home of students 
who were late in paying their tuition fees and demanded they hand over the money they owed, including interest 
(The annual profit was equal to 100%)....

Just the other day, I 
beat up a delinquent teacher who was asking for a salary raise. 
I then asked him to hand over his tuition fees.

There are little things like this happening every day. 
I don't have any time to rest.

If I had my way, I'd give up being the dean and 
just focus on my research.

Perhaps, #NAME#.
Maybe you'd make a good dean.

Calm yourself. With my brain of 1.8 million EQ, 
I'll easily be able to 
transform you into an excellent dean.

Don't move, #NAME#.
Hahahahah....

#NAME#.
Today is the anniversary of my father's death....

My father was a great Overlord.
Since we're on good terms, I could tell you the truth, 
when I was a kid, I always idolized my dad....
But, because of me, he...

I needed to surpass my father and 
become the Evil Academy's dean. 
I can only do this for him now.

My power will never stop increasing.
..... I have my limits, of course.

#NAME#.
I would be very grateful if you remained by my side.
Please remember this in the future.

#NAME#.
I've become 
much stronger because of you.

When I first heard that there were humans 
coming to the Netherworld to train Demons, 
I laughed out loud....

You definitely know your stuff, and you should not take those words lightly coming from me, 
the Dean of the Evil Academy.

I believe that you're talented enough to train someone to become the 
strongest Overlord in history.
There's one more thing.

To me, although I treat Raspberyl as an enemy, 
we are actually in some ways friends...

But with you, 
it's safe to say we are even more than friends. 
Perhaps even best friends.

#NAME#.
My friend.
From this day forward, we will battle side by side!

You're #NAME#. 
So I've heard that you're a really bad Delinquent (VILLAIN)?
The others have been talking about you.

But, know this, I will never give up 
my title as the #1 Delinquent of the Evil Academy!

Let me explain how it works!
At the Evil Academy, 
good is bad and bad is good!

When you're here, 
the well-behaved students are the delinquent students 
and the naughty ones are honor students!

I don't know how 
delinquent (VILLAIN) you are, 
but you can't beat me!

Who is the Evil Academy's #1 Delinquent? 
Come and find out, #NAME#!

Hey, #NAME#.
Can you tell me something?

I've been told that all humans 
are Delinquents (VILLAIN).

They wash their hands and gargle with mouthwash.
They brush their teeth after eating dinner.
Wash their hands after going to the bathroom.

How could the entire human race be 
taught such excellent customs!? 
I felt for sure it was just a rumor....?
But..... It is true!?

Well..... I never expected that it was true.
It seems that humans are experienced 
Delinquents (VILLAIN).

So, 
I'm challenging the innate 
villains?

....Well, one can hope!
This is fun!

#NAME#!!
It will be easy to surpass you in strength and 
become the strongest Delinquent (VILLAIN)!

Hey, #NAME#.
I guess not all humans 
are Delinquents (VILLAIN).

I've read on the internet that 
some Humans do terrible things that even 
Demons are incapable of doing.

Anyone who acts like that can't be called an Honor Student.
They're just trash.

Only those who 
follow the path of the Demon like Mao deserve to be called Honor Students.

You can fulfill your dreams 
without hindering others.
. This is what real Honor Students do.

For those Humans who don't understand this, 
they should be transformed by Mao.
What do you think, #NAME#?

Ah............
It is difficult for me to say what will happen.
You're truly amazing, #NAME#.

You wash your hands and gargle.
You brush your teeth every day. 
I can't compete with you.

If you keep this up, 
you'll surely 
steal the #1 Delinquent title from me.

Until today, there has only been one rule. 
Right, it's just....
Only 1 hour of video games a day!!!

Hmph.....
What do you think, #NAME#?
You're unable to do it?

The good times 
don't last very long.

I've been 
competing with you for the title of #1 Delinquent at the Evil Academy....

But now, 
I guess it doesn't matter who wins or loses.

I cherish the time I 
spent with you 
in order to become the No.1 Delinquent.

This is what youth means to us!
This is what it means to be partners!!

We will be rivals 
forever!

Come!
Let's start with the fundraising!!
Let's begin, #NAME#!!

My name is 
Valvatorez! I'm an ancient vampire and a Prinny Instructor in the 
Netherworld!

#NAME#!
I've heard that you're interested in training the greatest Overlord of all time!

Strongest Overlord Trainer VS. Prinny Instructor!
You and I both have a passion for education!
We both have a common goal!

So, 
beginning today, you will also be a Prinny Instructor!

Article 1 of the Prinny Code!
Be sure to add "dood" at the end of every sentence!!
Come, let me teach you a thing or two!

Article 1 of the Prinny Code!
Be sure to add "dood" at the end of every sentence!!

Hmph...
Let's get on the road of trials!

....Oh I forgot to ask, #NAME#.
Do you like to eat Sardines?

#NAME#?ot 
a Sardine from Valavatorez!
That Sardine was just freshly caught!

Listen up, #NAME#!
So, now that you're also a Prinny Instructor, 
you'll need to remember something.

You must always 
keep true to your promises, 
even if you don't like the other person you're making a promise to.

To Demons, 
every agreement is a contract...
and a noble one at that.

In the past, I thought this social custom was just a formality, but my laziness made me 
suffer greatly.

Ever since then, my Vampire powers have been depleted since I have not been able to drink 
Human blood.

However, this little situation allowed me to discover 
another source of power... Sardines!
They really are a magical food.

...Hmm? Something is wrong.
I guess if this is the case, it would be ok to 
break an agreement.

Hahah! What a situation to be in! I will make you a promise!
I will remain by your side until 
you have successfully trained the strongest Overlord!

I will continue to eat Sardines in order to keep this promise alive!
You can eat some too!!

#NAME#, 
have you eaten any Sardines in the past few days?

Vampires get their strength from Human blood. 
Although I've given up Human blood, I'm still alive and kicking. 
I love Sardines!

In other words, Sardines are my lifeblood!
Although Fenrich doesn't want to admit it, 
this is an undeniable fact!

Sardines are my favorite thing in the whole world! 
How can I repay them....?
This is a problem that's been eating away at my brain.

Thankfully, I've thought up some 
concrete and realistic plans.
Tell me what you think.

Plan No.1.
Push the United Nations to pass 
an international treaty that bans the excessive fishing of Sardines.

Plan No.2.
Invent some delicious dishes made from Sardines to 
teach the world why they are the best thing in the world.

Plan No.3.
In Japanese, the character for "Sardine" is a combination of the character for "fish" and the character for "weak". 
I want to change this so the character for "strong" is used instead.
